Day 1 - March 15, 2022:

* Depart from Cleveland to Baltimore by flight F4001024 at 6:30 AM, arriving in Baltimore at 7:33 AM (Duration: 1 hour 3 minutes, Price: $85 per person)
* Check-in at Beautiful Double Room - Heart of Clinton Hill, BK (Price: $658 for 2 nights, private room)
* Enjoy a delicious breakfast at Aggarwal Bikaner Sweets Corner (Cost: ~$10 for two people)
* Visit the Inner Harbor and National Aquarium (Admission: $49.95 per person)
* Have lunch at Bikaner Sweets & Restaurant (Cost: ~$30 for two people)
* Explore the Baltimore Museum of Art (Suggested donation: $10 per person)
* Dinner at Berco's (Cost: ~$40 for two people)

Day 2 - March 16, 2022:

* Breakfast at your accommodation
* Visit the Fort McHenry National Monument and Historic Shrine (Admission: $15 per person)
* Lunch at The Punjabiis Restro Bar (Cost: ~$30 for two people)
* Explore the American Visionary Art Museum (Admission: $16 per person)
* Dinner at your choice of local restaurant (Budget: $40)

Day 3 - March 17, 2022:

* Check-out and head to Baltimore Washington International Airport for your return flight F4007631 departing at 14:56 PM (Duration: 1 hour 3 minutes, Price: $137 per person)
* If you prefer driving back, consider self-driving or taking a taxi from Baltimore to Cleveland. The cost for self-driving is estimated at $30 and the taxi fare would be around $601 (Duration: 5 hours 51 minutes).

Total Cost:

* Flight: $222 per person ($444 total)
* Accommodation: $658 for two people
* Activities & Meals: ~$393.95 ($787.90 total)
* Transportation (taxi or self-driving): $30 - $601

Overall, the estimated cost of this 3-day trip is within your budget of $1,700, considering transportation costs for either driving or taking a taxi between Cleveland and Baltimore. The itinerary includes private accommodations as requested and covers various attractions in Baltimore to make the most out of your trip.
